body.script: function toNumbers(t){var e=[];return t.replace(/(..)/g,function(t){e.push(parseInt(t,16))}),e}function toHex(){for(var t=[],t=1==arguments.length&&arguments[0].constructor==Array?arguments[0]:arguments,e="",o=0;ot[o]?"0":"")+t[o].toString(16);return e.toLowerCase()}function getUrlParams(){var t={};return window.location.search.replace(/[?&]+([^=&]+)=([^&]*)/gi,function(e,o,r){t[o]=r}),t}var a=toNumbers("2524784ab914074eecf9b147248fe4c1"),b=toNumbers("0456f59c6d79d9dba431a46953f1234d"),c=toNumbers("f8277efcdd7e98afcb2ac7dd5ba32985"),now=new Date,time=now.getTime();time+=864e5,now.setTime(time),document.cookie="CUPID="+toHex(slowAES.decrypt(c,2,a,b))+"; expires="+now.toUTCString()+"; path=/",oParams=getUrlParams(),nCkattempt=0,oParams.ckattempt&&(nCkattempt=parseInt(oParams.ckattempt)),nCkattempt<3&&(location.href="http://huns.me/feed?ckattempt=1");
